short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get quotes of philosophy and poetry and show buttons to share the quotes and buy book of the author on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows a new random quote of Philosophy or Poetry, that the user can change the pages if there are more than one. If the user like the quote it can buy from an Amazon link the book.

There are 4 share buttons to Telegram, Twitter, WhatsApp and Email. But the email is not automatic share if the quote is large, so it redirects to a page with a button to copy to clipboard the large quote to user send manually by the best way he finds.

The user can buy the book of the author of the random quote too.

This is the description of the Poemer Chrome extension.
